about.title: About me
about.paragraph1: I'm a junior web developer with a strong passion for back-end development. I've already built several real-world projects using Django, TailwindCSS, and SQLite — and I’m constantly leveling up my skills.
about.paragraph2: Even as a newcomer to the industry, I'm reliable, curious, and fully committed. I approach each line of code as an opportunity to grow and to build useful, efficient tools that serve real needs.
about.paragraph3: I'm comfortable working independently or collaboratively, and I always aim to deliver clean, maintainable, and user-friendly code. Got a project in mind? I’d be happy to bring it to life with you.
